testsuite.name: Test
testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m > /help The program support the: Addition + and Subtraction - operators: Consider that the even number of minuses gives a plus, and the odd number of minuses gives a minus! Look at it this way: 2 -- 2 equals 2 - (-2) equals 2 + 2. > > /exit Bye! ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m > 7 + 1 + 4 12 > 23 - 17 - 4 2 > 23 - 17 - 13 -7 > -9 - 4 - 21 -34 > 33 + 21 + 11 + 49 - 32 - 9 + 1 - 80 + 4 -2 > 101 101 > -302 -302 > > 10 - 7 - 3 0 > /exit Bye! ?[1;31m Start test 3?[0m > 8 --- 3 5 > 8 -- 3 11 > 32 ++++++++++++++ 4 36 > 5 --- 2 ++++++ 4 -- 2 ---- 1 10 > /exit Bye!
